topic.fullpath: Topic :: Formats and Protocols :: Data Formats :: XML

name: Universal Version Description
short_description: Universal Version Description (UVD) is a XML-based format to describe versionable objects (like software). It focuses on multi-language-support, documenting changes between versions, as well as providing download/update and support information.
